name: Identity Lost ~AUTUMN FESTIVAL~
description:
Welcome to Identity Lost College!

Join the Identity Lost pals at your first days at college - Identity Lost College! Meet all the members of Identity Lost during the Autumn Festival and get acquainted with school before your first year really starts! Get ready for laughs, drama, and action-packed sequences in this short little visual novel.

There are a total of 2 endings and the game can be completed in roughly 30 minutes. This was also made as part of a personal game jam in the span of a week! Maybe we'll make another game one day...? In the meantime, please check out our Vtubing group out at identitylo.st!
